thread.title: MLS, Largan Bright to invest 200 mln yuan in Kaifa's LED lighting unit
thread.title_full: BRIEF-MLS, Largan Bright to invest 200 mln yuan in Kaifa's LED lighting unit | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: MLS, Largan Bright to invest 200 mln yuan in Kaifa's LED lighting unit
text:
Sept 10 Shenzhen Kaifa Technology Co Ltd
* Says MLS and Largan Bright plan to invest 200 million yuan ($31.40 million) in its LED lighting unit for 12.1 percent stake
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1EPIcQ5
 ($1 = 6.3700 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
